entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
